_source.text: Actually, atheists claim three things in this regard: we claim that you are patently lying when you invent some god or other; we claim that no one has the truth, if by "truth" you mean an understanding of why the universe exists; and we claim that the application of reason gets us to everyday truths better than does wishful thinking.

text: Actually, atheists claim three things in this regard: we claim that you are patently lying when you invent some god or other; we claim that no one has the **truth**, if by "**truth**" you mean an understanding of why the universe exists; and we claim that the application of reason gets us to everyday truths **better** **than** does **wishful** **thinking**.
